svg.style: background: transparent; background-color: transparent; color-scheme: light dark;
svg.content: <mxfile host="app.diagrams.net" agent="Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/136.0.0.0 Safari/537.36" version="26.1.1"> <diagram name="Page-1" id="D0lxNpj4DfddwrbvpOeO"> <mxGraphModel dx="1838" dy="523" grid="1" gridSize="10" guides="1" tooltips="1" connect="1" arrows="1" fold="1" page="1" pageScale="1" pageWidth="850" pageHeight="1100" math="0" shadow="0"> <root> <mxCell id="0" /> <mxCell id="1" parent="0" /> <mxCell id="hZDFTx5An_JaXHnycBBI-1" value="Direction Buttons" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="-80" y="80" width="120" height="60" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="hZDFTx5An_JaXHnycBBI-2" value="Place Flag Button" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="120" y="80" width="120" height="60" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="hZDFTx5An_JaXHnycBBI-3" value="Check case button" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="320" y="80" width="120" height="60" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="hZDFTx5An_JaXHnycBBI-4" value="Raspberry Pi" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="120" y="200" width="120" height="60" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="hZDFTx5An_JaXHnycBBI-5" value="" style="endArrow=classic;html=1;rounded=0;" edge="1" parent="1" source="hZDFTx5An_JaXHnycBBI-1"> <mxGeometry width="50" height="50" relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint x="10" y="220" as="sourcePoint" /> <mxPoint x="180" y="200" as="targetPoint" /> <Array as="points"> <mxPoint x="-20" y="140" /> </Array> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="hZDFTx5An_JaXHnycBBI-6" value="" style="endArrow=classic;html=1;rounded=0;exitX=0.5;exitY=1;exitDx=0;exitDy=0;entryX=0.5;entryY=0;entryDx=0;entryDy=0;" edge="1" parent="1" source="hZDFTx5An_JaXHnycBBI-2" target="hZDFTx5An_JaXHnycBBI-4"> <mxGeometry width="50" height="50" relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint x="270" y="210" as="sourcePoint" /> <mxPoint x="320" y="160" as="targetPoint" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="hZDFTx5An_JaXHnycBBI-7" value="" style="endArrow=classic;html=1;rounded=0;" edge="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry width="50" height="50" relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint x="383" y="140" as="sourcePoint" /> <mxPoint x="180" y="200" as="targetPoint" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="hZDFTx5An_JaXHnycBBI-8" value="Game Control" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="320" y="200" width="120" height="60" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="hZDFTx5An_JaXHnycBBI-9" value="" style="endArrow=classic;startArrow=classic;html=1;rounded=0;entryX=0;entryY=0.5;entryDx=0;entryDy=0;exitX=1;exitY=0.5;exitDx=0;exitDy=0;" edge="1" parent="1" source="hZDFTx5An_JaXHnycBBI-4" target="hZDFTx5An_JaXHnycBBI-8"> <mxGeometry width="50" height="50" relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint x="240" y="270" as="sourcePoint" /> <mxPoint x="290" y="220" as="targetPoint" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="hZDFTx5An_JaXHnycBBI-10" value="" style="endArrow=classic;html=1;rounded=0;exitX=0.537;exitY=0.974;exitDx=0;exitDy=0;exitPerimeter=0;" edge="1" parent="1" source="hZDFTx5An_JaXHnycBBI-4"> <mxGeometry width="50" height="50" relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint x="180" y="370" as="sourcePoint" /> <mxPoint x="184" y="320" as="targetPoint" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="hZDFTx5An_JaXHnycBBI-11" value="LCD Display" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="120" y="320" width="120" height="60" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> </root> </mxGraphModel> </diagram> </mxfile>

rect.style: fill: light-dark(#ffffff, var(--ge-dark-color, #121212)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255));

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 118px; height: 1px; padding-top: 30px; margin-left: 1px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center; color: #000000;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: "Helvetica"; color: light-dark(#000000, #ffffff); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;
